name: Plexers
body:
### Plexers
This site will host the projects by the software engineering team / indie game developers Plexers. We are a new team based in Thessaloniki. We come from various places, from the exotic Alexandroupolis to the islandic Corfu to the mountainous Tirnavos. We share though a common vision: our passion for high quality software.


### Products
Currently we have no available products but lots of them are under construction. Our next project is probably going to be announced soon. Stay tuned!


### The Team
Out team consists of twelve invaluable people.


### Support or Contact
Feel free to contact us at admin@plexers.biz and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
